morbidity, problems with bonding and breastfeeding
• Infancy and childhood – poor mother-child attachment, poor or inadequate infant nutrition in the first year of life,
and childhood developmental and behavioural problems, incomplete immunisations
Risk factors for maternal mental health conditions 
• being a teenager
• living with a chronic disease including HIV
• poor support / poor relationships
• unwanted / unintended pregnancy
• difficult life events / trauma (e.g. bereavement
